html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-04592025-03-23ESDC, CEIC
ActEmployment Insurance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations (Pilot Project No. 24)
PrecisRegulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE REGULATIONS (PILOT PROJECT NO. 24) in order to (1) wave the one-week EI waiting period; (2) suspend the treatment of rules on monies paid on separation; and (3) artificially boost the EI regional unemployment rates and establishing a minimum unemployment rate.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0115 Publication Date: 2025-04-09
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE REGULATIONS (PILOT PROJECT NO. 24) in order to (1) wave the one-week EI waiting period; (2) suspend the treatment of rules on monies paid on separation; and (3) artificially boost the EI regional unemployment rates and establishing a minimum unemployment rate.
